ModulePrefs.title: Timesheet Recorder
ModulePrefs.description: A tool for recording timesheet data. Tasks can be created, renamed and reordered, with a second tab providing a summary of the last 4 weeks of your recorded data. Event data can also be synchronised with a chosen Google calendar.
ModulePrefs.author: Qiladan

Module.Content:
